aircraft.value: Skyguard MK-7 - AC-6318-485 at Sector East Station

defect_observed.value: Pressure accumulator pre-charge loss. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Brake System component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 20/01/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 22/01/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 21/01/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 26/01/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 25/01/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

Part - III: (Defect Details)

b) Defect Observed: Pressure accumulator pre-charge loss. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Brake System component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
